list_definition.definition: the part of the face by which people and animals smell and usually breathe

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She held the flower to her nose
He punched the man on the nose.
Police dogs have good noses and can follow criminals’ trails.

list_definition.definition: the part of anything which is like a nose in shape or position
to make a way by pushing carefully forward

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The ship nosed (its way) through the ice.

list_definition.definition: to look or search as if by smelling
